entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:55 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 1:56 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
